column1: #Text=This repo is heavily based on the [pymarl](https://github.com/benellis3/pymarl2)
#Text=please follow the installation guide in the original repo [pymarl](https://github.com/benellis3/pymarl2)
#Text=To run the code, you can use the following command:
#Text=> You have to change `entity: "xxx"` in the `src/config/default.yaml` file to your own wandb entity.
#Text=you can change the hyperparameters in the `qmix.sh` file.
#Text=For instance to run protoss5v5 map, you can use the following command (default is terran5v5):
#Text=To run 10v10 map, you should change the `sc2_gen_terran.yaml` file
#Text=If you find this repository useful, please cite our [paper]([https://arxiv.org/abs/2207.05631](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2406.13930)):
#Text=  title={Soft-QMIX: Integrating Maximum Entropy For Monotonic Value Function Factorization},
#Text=  author={Chen, Wentse and Huang, Shiyu and Schneider, Jeff},
